name: AMD Wraith Stealth Cooler
description: The AMD Wraith Stealth is a low-profile stock CPU cooler bundled with select Ryzen processors. It features an aluminum heatsink and a quiet fan, suitable for CPUs with a 65W TDP, making it a reliable choice for budget builds and standard computing tasks.

name: AMD Stock Heatsink Fan
description: A standard AMD stock CPU cooler designed to provide sufficient cooling for compatible processors under normal operating conditions. While generally better than competitor stock options, they can become audible under heavy CPU loads. [24, 25]

name: Deepcool AG400 Single Tower Hydro Bearing CPU Air Cooler ARGB White
description: A single-tower 120mm CPU cooler featuring four direct-touch copper heatpipes and a hydro bearing fan with ARGB lighting. It offers excellent thermal performance and RAM compatibility in a streamlined and budget-friendly package.

name: MSI PRO B650M-A WiFi D5 AM5 DDR5 Motherboard
description: A Micro-ATX motherboard for AMD Ryzen 7000 series CPUs, supporting DDR5 memory. It offers a robust feature set including PCIe 4.0, Wi-Fi 6E, and 2.5G LAN, aimed at professionals and builders looking for a balance of performance and value.

name: Biostar A520MHP Socket AM4 DDR4 Motherboard
description: A budget-friendly Micro-ATX motherboard with the AMD A520 chipset, supporting 3rd, 4th, and 5th Gen Ryzen CPUs. It features DDR4 memory support, a PCIe M.2 slot, and HDMI 4K resolution support, making it a solid foundation for entry-level builds.

name: Biostar RX 580 VA5805RV82 Dual Cooling Fan 8GB 256-bit GDDR5 Gaming Videocard
description: An 8GB GDDR5 graphics card with a dual cooling fan design, offering solid 1080p gaming performance. It's a capable and affordable option for gamers looking for good frame rates on a budget.

name: MSI GeForce RTX 3060 Ventus 2X OC 12GB GDDR6 Gaming Graphics Card
description: A 12GB GDDR6 graphics card featuring a dual-fan thermal design. It delivers excellent performance for 1080p and 1440p gaming, with real-time ray tracing and AI-enhanced graphics.

name: Acer AC-550 550W Full Modular 80+ Bronze Power Supply
description: A 550W fully modular power supply with 80+ Bronze certification, ensuring efficient power delivery and easy cable management. It provides reliable performance for mainstream gaming and productivity systems.

name: InPlay GS750-Ultra (750W, 450W, 650W) 80+ Bronze Rated Hydro Bearing RGB Power Supply
description: An 80+ Bronze rated power supply available in multiple wattage options. It features a hydro bearing RGB fan for quiet operation and customizable aesthetics, providing stable power for gaming rigs.

name: Seagate Barracuda ST1000DM010 1TB 7200RPM SATA HDD
description: A 1TB internal hard drive with a 7200 RPM spindle speed and 64MB cache. It is a cost-effective solution for desktop storage, offering reliable performance for everyday computing and data archiving. [6, 8, 18, 19, 37]

name: Seagate ST2000DM008 2TB SATA HDD
description: A 2TB internal hard drive with a 7200 RPM spindle speed and 256MB cache. It provides ample storage for large files, games, and media, making it a great choice for desktop PCs and home servers.

name: Kingston SSDNow A400 480GB SATA 2.5 SSD
description: A 480GB SATA 2.5-inch solid-state drive that dramatically improves the responsiveness of your existing system with incredible boot, loading, and transfer times. It's a reliable and affordable upgrade for laptops and desktops.

name: Ramsta R600 256GB M.2 SATA SSD
description: A 256GB M.2 SATA solid-state drive offering a compact form factor and faster performance than traditional hard drives. It's a cost-effective choice for improving boot times and application loading.

name: Kingston Fury Renegade SFYRS 500GB PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD
description: A 500GB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD delivering cutting-edge performance with blazing-fast read/write speeds. It's ideal for gaming and content creation, providing top-tier performance for demanding users.

name: Team Elite TForce Delta 16GB (2x8GB) 3200MHz DDR4 RGB White
description: A 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 memory kit with a 3200MHz frequency and full-frame 120° ultra-wide-angle RGB lighting. It features a minimalist, asymmetrical heat spreader in white, perfect for stylish and high-performance PC builds. [12, 45]

name: Kingston Fury Beast 16GB 3200MT/s DDR4 RGB Black
description: A 16GB DDR4 memory module with a speed of 3200MT/s and customizable RGB lighting. It provides a powerful performance boost for gaming, video editing, and rendering, with a stylish black heat spreader.

name: Kingston KVR32S22S8/16 16GB 3200MHz DDR4 SODIMM
description: A 16GB DDR4 3200MHz SODIMM memory module designed for laptops and small form-factor PCs. It offers reliable, high-performance, and is a cost-effective way to upgrade your system's memory.

name: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core 12-Thread AM4
description: A 6-core, 12-thread processor built on the Zen 3 architecture, offering a significant performance uplift for gaming and productivity tasks. It is highly power-efficient and a popular choice for mainstream PC builds. [3, 9, 16, 21, 24]

name: AMD Ryzen 7 5700G 8-Core 16-Thread AM4
description: An 8-core, 16-thread processor with powerful integrated Radeon graphics, making it an excellent all-in-one solution for gaming and content creation without the need for a discrete graphics card.

name: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G 4-Core AM4
description: A 4-core processor with built-in Radeon Vega 8 graphics. It's a budget-friendly choice for entry-level PCs, offering good performance for everyday tasks and light gaming. [1, 11, 25, 35, 36]

name: AMD Ryzen 7 7700X AM5
description: An 8-core, 16-thread processor based on the Zen 4 architecture, designed for the AM5 platform. It offers exceptional performance for gaming and content creation, with support for DDR5 memory and PCIe 5.0. [5, 10, 17, 32, 33]

name: Intel Core i7-14700F LGA 1700
description: A 20-core, 28-thread processor from Intel's 14th generation, featuring a hybrid architecture with 8 Performance-cores and 12 Efficient-cores. It delivers outstanding performance for demanding games and applications, but requires a discrete graphics card. [7, 29, 39, 41, 42]

name: InPlay NK680-B Red Switch Mechanical Keyboard Black
description: A 68-key mechanical gaming keyboard with red switches for fast and quiet keystrokes. It features a compact 65% layout, a metal top cover, and customizable RGB lighting, offering a great entry into mechanical keyboards. [13, 43, 44, 46]

name: A4Tech KRS-85 USB Keyboard Black
description: A reliable and comfortable wired USB keyboard with laser-engraved keys and a spill-resistant design. Its round-edge keycaps and adjustable height provide a comfortable typing experience for everyday use. [14, 23, 26, 28, 38]

name: Fantech MK890 V2 Atom 96 Hot-Swappable Mechanical Keyboard Sky Blue
description: A 96% layout hot-swappable mechanical keyboard with a sky blue color scheme. It features pre-lubed switches for a smoother typing experience, customizable RGB lighting, and a compact yet functional design.

name: Rakk Alti BVR / RGY Illuminated Gaming Mouse
description: A budget-friendly gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and on-the-fly DPI adjustment up to 4800 DPI. It features a braided cable and Omron switches for durability, offering excellent value for gamers. [2, 4, 27, 31, 34]

name: Nvision N2455PRO-B 100Hz IPS Panel 23.8 Black
description: A 23.8-inch IPS monitor with a 100Hz refresh rate and Full HD resolution. It delivers smooth visuals and vibrant colors, making it a great option for both gaming and productivity in a sleek black design.

name: Nvision N2455PRO-W 100Hz IPS Panel 23.8 White
description: A 23.8-inch IPS monitor with a 100Hz refresh rate and Full HD resolution, presented in a stylish white finish. It offers smooth motion and vivid colors, ideal for a clean and modern setup for gaming or work.

name: Secure 220V AVR
description: An automatic voltage regulator (AVR) designed to protect your electronic devices from voltage fluctuations and power surges. It provides stable 220V output, ensuring the longevity and performance of your computer and other sensitive equipment. [15, 20, 22, 30, 40]

name: VGA 5m Cable
description: A 5-meter VGA cable for connecting analog video signals between computers and monitors, projectors, or other displays. It provides a reliable connection for older or legacy devices.

name: Ad-link HDMI 1.5m Cable Redmesh
description: A 1.5-meter HDMI cable with a durable red mesh jacket for connecting high-definition audio and video devices. It supports various resolutions and is ideal for a clean and organized setup.

name: Adlink Cat5 100m UTP Cable Gray
description: A 100-meter roll of Cat5 UTP (Unshielded Twisted Pair) Ethernet cable in gray. It's suitable for creating custom-length network cables for home or office networking.

name: InPlay Wind 05 and Wind 01 Acrylic Side Panel Micro ATX Tempered Glass Case
description: A Micro-ATX PC case featuring a tempered glass side panel and options for acrylic front panels. It offers good airflow and a clear view of your components, making it a stylish choice for budget to mid-range builds.

name: YGT V300 M-ATX Tempered Glass Gaming PC Case White
description: A white Micro-ATX gaming PC case with a tempered glass side panel to showcase your build. It is designed for good airflow and offers a clean, modern aesthetic for a stylish gaming setup.

name: PC1
description: A high-precision gaming mouse with customizable DPI settings and RGB lighting.

name: PC2
description: Durable mechanical keyboard with responsive keys and customizable RGB lighting.

name: PC3
description: High-definition webcam for clear video calls and streaming.
